DataElement.preferredName: PTEN Gene Expression Cytogenetic Analysis Outcome Status

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PTEN Gene Expression Cytogenetic Analysis Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: This gene plays a role in signal transduction and apoptosis.
